front.title: Advertising Seamless Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (S-BFD) Discriminators in Layer 2 Tunneling Protocol, Version 3 (L2TPv3)

abstract.t: This document defines a new Attribute Value Pair (AVP) that allows L2TP Control Connection Endpoints (LCCEs) to advertise one or more Seamless Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (S-BFD) Discriminator values using the Layer 2 Tunneling Protocol, Version 3 (L2TPv3).
